# image

**Instance Property**

The image data for this sample.

## Declaration

```swift
let image: CVPixelBuffer
```

## Discussion

Provide image data in the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreVideo/kCVPixelFormatType_32BGRA] or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/CoreVideo/kCVPixelFormatType_32ARGB] pixel formats.

## Describing the sample

- **metadata**: An image’s EXIF metadata.
- **depthDataMap**: The image’s depth data.
- **gravity**: An image’s gravity vector.
- **objectMask**: The image’s object mask.
title: image
